alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Woodruff (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 10 at 10:36AM CST until further notice by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Arkansas... Cache River Near Patterson affecting Jackson and Woodruff Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON (DECEMBER 12, 2022) UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cache River Near Patterson. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Low swampy timberland along the river begins to flood. At 9.0 feet, Low swampy timberland along the river begins to flood. Flood gates should be closed and equipment moved out of the low grounds along the river and tributaries. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CST Saturday the stage was 7.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage by Monday afternoon (DEC 12) and continue rising to 9.5 feet by Thursday morning (DEC 15). - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecast 12 PM Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Crest Time Date Cache River Patterson 9.0 7.3 Sat 9 AM 7.2 9.0 9.4 **Rising** &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts. Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.
